TopicTitle: Prepare your butts KSP, Rhyunix is back

Articles.Content:
Hey there everyone,

Just a quick hi from moi becuase I was here but then I died. So dramatic (wipes tears)

Anyhow the explosions will continue as always!

For anyone who was wondering what happened to SESEOR, I am awaiting the info on what happened to Mission reports.

In the meantime, i can... Hey wait.... Jeb, where you going... No don't touch tha-00-l

Transmission end

Welcome back Rhyunix

Mission Reports will be restored at some point, as will Rocket Builders and all the other missing forum areas, and I can't wait
